_header: Yet will I write of thee a story
Subjects: Lucy, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Lucy in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
[Ȝ]hete wil I wryt of þe storyhere next of sancte
                    lucy…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…ovt of þis warld þat ve ma twynbut schame det &
                    dedly syne
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 2.172-7.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 2.2.387-97.
